## Setup
1. Login to the lab computer.    
2. Navigate to github.com and login.  
3. Find the class repository "datascibiol" (https://github.com/jmledford3115/datascibiol).  
4. Download a copy the class repository to the desktop.  
5. Clone your repository to the desktop using GitHub Desktop.  
6. Copy the files for today's lab from the class repository and paste them into **your** repository.  
7. Open today's lab in RStudio.  

## Midterm 1
1. Your first midterm will be held next Thursday, Jan 29th during class.  
2. We will have an in-class practice exam next Tuesday, Jan 27th.  
3. The exam in open note; i.e. you can use the notes in your repository.  
4. There are no internet searches or AI allowed during the exam and you must use the lab computers.
